title: Counter
description: In this lab, we will explore how to create a counter using JavaScript. The counter will have the ability to count up or down within a specified range, with a custom step and duration. We will use setInterval() to achieve the effect and update the value of the selected element using innerHTML.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
